ast.query

Interface Query

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ASTNode<fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.QueryResultI>, fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.requests.interfaces.QueryI, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BQuery, GQuery

    public interface Query
extends fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.requests.interfaces.QueryI, ASTNode<fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.QueryResultI>
    This abstract class represents a query in the abstract syntax tree (AST). It implements the QueryI interface, used to represent queries in the sensor network, as well as the ASTNode interface for manipulation of abstract syntax tree nodes. This class provides a common base for other specific query classes.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface ast.ASTNode

        eval, queryString
